posts.post_title: T206 Cobb PSA 6 EX-MT and Chase EX Graded *Scans Added*
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ryan
The 2 cards are T206's.  

The Pink Chase is a T-206 BVG 5  Asking ($399 w/paypal) ($374 Check/MO)
The Red Cobb is a T-206 PSA 6 Asking ($3099) ($2999 Check/MO)

Cobb price reduced $400.  Need to sell.

Both Backs are Sweet Caporal.  If you want them both, I can make a deal.  Scan of Chase is below (one photo/one scan)  The scan of the Cobb is coming soon.

E-mail me at incugator@hotmail.com if you are interested.
